name: STATE SELECTION BOARD, ODISHA POLICE, CUTTACK

details.sub:- Publication of Written Examination: Sub:- Publication of Written Examination (CBRE) Result for the post of Sepoys / Constables in Battalions. KKK. Pursuant to the Indicative Advertisement No.01/SSB, dtd.14.09.2024, Advertisement No.02/SSB, dtd.22.09.2024, Addendum No.04/SSB, dtd. 23.10.2024 and subsequent notices, the provisional results of the written examination (CBRE) held from 07.12.2024 to 18.12.2024 for the post of Sepoys/ Constables in OSAP / IR / SS Battalions are hereby published.
details.The Roll Nos. of the candidates declared: The Roll Nos. of the candidates declared to have passed the written examination (CBRE) and shortlisted to appear for the Physical Measurement Test and Physical Efficiency Test have been published Battalion-wise separately. The candidates concerned may access their results by clicking on the links available in the above website. It may be noted that the selection is purely provisional in nature.
details.The candidates can also login into the w: The candidates can also login into the website www.odishapolice.gov.in using their application number & date of birth to see the details of marks obtained by them. The schedule for conduct of Physical Measurement Test and Physical Efficiency Test will be intimated soon. Candidates shortlisted for the Physical Measurement Test and Physical Efficiency Test will be issued e-Admit Cards shortly. The shortlisted candidates are advised to regularly visit the website to know the further updates.
details.It is to inform that as per direction: It is to inform that as per direction of the Hon’ble High Court of Odisha, all the over aged candidates (Petitioners) who had filed the Writ petitions before the Hon’ble High Court of Odisha seeking relaxation in upper age limit were allowed to submit online applications and subsequently allowed to appear in the written examination. The Hon’ble High Court of Odisha vide their Order dated 23.12.2024 have granted stay on the judgment dated 05.12.2024. Hence, the written examination result of the over aged candidates (Petitioners) is not published.

details.Author: Transport Commissioner -cum- Chairman, Recruitment of Drivers in P.M.T Odisha, Cuttack
